titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [8. 9. 1930]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Abschrift (Cambridge Letters, S. 248). Publiziert (Cambridge Letters, S. 248).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: We have glorious weather since about a fortnight and my work is getting on rather well. This is another view of the place where I live. I hope you're having a good time too.
